patthana17.30:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo
patthana17.30:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, sahajāte cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.30:2.1_1: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe nava, anantare tīṇi …pe…
patthana17.30:3.1_1: naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā
